sentences.sentence: "I shall make you tell me about Rajahs presently," he said, "but first tell me what the second thing was."
sentences.translation: “你以后再告诉我印度王公的事，”他说，“先告诉我第二件事是什么。”

sentences.sentence: A 19th century French traveler described an excruciating method in India during the rule of the Rajahs.
sentences.translation: 十九世纪有一位法国旅行者描述了印度王公统治时期一种极其残酷的行刑方式。
